price: Ariko baramuhinyuye (ya ngamiya) barayica. Nuko Nyagasani wabo arabarimbura ku bw’icyaha cyabo, ndetse bose abarimbura mu buryo bureshya (baba abakuru n’abato, abakire n’abakene, ndetse n’abakomeye n’abaciriritse).
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu faʿaqarūhā fadamdama ʿalayhim rabbuhum bidhanbihim fasawwāhā
